title: Bug 32770 - Improving Error Message for Java Application Launch
description: This bug report is related to the error message displayed when attempting to launch a Java application. The current error message 'Launch failed: no main type found' is unhelpful and should be improved to provide better assistance to users.
OB: The observed behavior is that a dialog appears with the unhelpful error message 'Launch failed: no main type found.'
EB: The expected behavior is to provide a more informative and user-friendly error message that assists users in troubleshooting or resolving the issue.
SR: No steps to reproduce are provided in the bug report. The bug pertains to improving the error message and does not require specific steps for reproduction.
